name: Advanced Retirement Planner
description: Professional-grade retirement planning with complete multi-step wizard and UX overhaul
author: Yali Pollak (יהלי פולק)
features: 🧙‍♂️ Complete 8-step guided wizard for data collection
📋 Progressive disclosure: collect data first, show results after
🌍 Country-specific pension contribution rules (Israel, USA, UK)
🏦 Comprehensive savings tracking (pension, training fund, investments)
⚙️ Management fees and investment preferences configuration
Complete multi-currency integration (ILS, USD, EUR, GBP, BTC, ETH)
Dynamic form labels with currency symbols
Real-time currency conversion and value updates
RSU stock price integration for 60+ companies
majorChanges: 🚀 COMPLETE UX OVERHAUL: Replaced overwhelming single-page form with guided 8-step wizard
🧙‍♂️ NEW: Progressive data collection - app starts in wizard mode, shows results after completion
🌍 NEW: Country-specific pension contribution rules (Israel 17.5%, USA 12%, UK 8%)
📝 NEW: Multi-step data collection: Personal → Salary → Savings → Contributions → Fees → Investments → Goals → Review
✅ FIXED: Removed invalid X-Frame-Options meta tag that browsers ignore
✅ FIXED: All React controlled/uncontrolled input warnings resolved
🎯 ENHANCED: Skip functionality for optional wizard steps
📊 ENHANCED: Progress indicator with step navigation and completion tracking
🔧 TECHNICAL: Complete wizard infrastructure with state management and validation
Previous v5.3.7 dashboard calculation fixes maintained and integrated
